_source.text: 5. Oh yeah....if you use your phone as an alarm....and you wake up in the morning to shut it off...you had better be careful how you turn off the alarm....because if you touch any other button option...or move away from that alarm screen..if you touch the wrong button...and once you do you cannot return to turn off the alarm....the phone alarm will keep buzzing off its alarm until you power it down...very bad way to wake up in the morning.

text: ...you had **better** be careful how you turn off the alarm....**because** if you touch any other button option
return to turn off the alarm....the phone alarm will **keep** buzzing off its alarm until you power it down...very bad way to **wake** up in the morning.
5. Oh yeah....if you use your phone as an alarm....and you **wake** up in the morning to shut it off
